author: yojo
title: Aotearoa, New Zealand Hub
description: Adoption in Aotearoa, New Zealand is just beginning but people lack awareness/understanding of Cardano, Catalyst & the ecosystem.
solution: Programme of community building/discovery/onboarding events in network of community hubs/online for 'Kiwi Cardonians' & the curious.
experience: Co-founded nationwide community-led place-based network of hubs running events to grow entrepreneurial & digitally capable communities.
